unpublishedAction.name: save_to_db
jsonPathKeys:
{
	...generate_data.data,
	"title": GeneratedData.formData.title,
	"summary": GeneratedData.formData.summary,
	"eli5_explanation": GeneratedData.formData.eli5,
	"notification": {
		"title": GeneratedData.formData.notificationHeading,
		"body": GeneratedData.formData.notificationBody
	},
	"external_url": appsmith.store.postDetails.url,
	"image_url": appsmith.store.postDetails.image_url,
	"interest_categories": [appsmith.store.postDetails.category],
	"content_type": appsmith.store.postDetails.content_type
}
